meanings.sent1: I will be reinspecting the car to make sure it is safe to drive.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic is reinspecting the engine to find the source of the problem.
meanings.sent3: After reinspecting the cake, she realized she forgot to add sugar.
meanings.sent4: He kept reinspecting the map, hoping to find a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: Reinspecting the old house revealed a hidden room behind the bookshelf.

meanings.sent1: The reinspecting of the documents revealed a mistake in the calculations.
meanings.sent2: Reinspecting is important to ensure quality control in the production process.
meanings.sent3: The constant reinspecting of his appearance made him late for the party.
meanings.sent4: The company's success was attributed to their thorough reinspecting of products before release.
meanings.sent5: The reinspecting of the bridge structure prevented a potential disaster.
